byline.contributor: Henrik Pryser Libell contributed reporting from Oslo, and Victor Homola from Berlin.

abstract: Norwegian program helps immigrants from Africa and elsewhere adjust to country's more open European culture; courses offered to increasing stream of asylum seekers teaches social norms in effort to prevent sexual violence after recent surge in rapes.
lead_paragraph: A pioneering program seeks to combat sexual violence by helping new immigrants adapt to a society whose sexual norms they may find confusing.

headline.main: Norway Offers Migrants a Lesson in How to Treat Women
headline.print_headline: Norway Offers Immigrants a Gentle Lesson in How to Treat Women

snippet: A pioneering program seeks to combat sexual violence by helping new immigrants adapt to a society whose sexual norms they may find confusing.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject
